name: AVAudioSession.PolarPattern
desc: Constants that describe the possible polar patterns of the data source on an iOS device.

items.name: init(rawValue: String)
items.desc: Creates a new instance with the raw value you specify.

items.name: static let stereo: AVAudioSession.PolarPattern
items.desc: A polar pattern that captures a stereo image of an audio source.

items.name: static let cardioid: AVAudioSession.PolarPattern
items.desc: A data source that’s most sensitive to sound from the direction of the data source and is nearly insensitive to sound from the opposite direction.

items.name: static let subcardioid: AVAudioSession.PolarPattern
items.desc: A data source that’s most sensitive to sound from the direction of the data source and is less sensitive to sound from the opposite direction.

items.name: static let omnidirectional: AVAudioSession.PolarPattern
items.desc: A data source that’s equally sensitive to sound from any direction.
